./.body: My Geomagicdesignxnote introductionThis is winnerzr's Geomagicdesignxnote.It mainly show you some Geomagicdesignx skills,which was learned through studying.Welcome to star and fork.My Geomagicdesignxnote introduction This is winnerzr's Geomagicdesignxnote. It mainly show you some Geomagicdesignx skills,which was learned through studying. Welcome to star and fork. My hexo blog is Winnerzr. My github link Winnerzr. It is a book powered by GitBook. The software used in the experiment is Geomagicdesignx Your support is the driving force of my creation. © by winnerzr all right reserved，powered by Gitbook该文档修订时间： 2022-01-19 18:30:11 new Valine({el: "#vcomments",appId: 'Pmai2zSyIldhmWIcUD2yFIcp-gzGzoHsz',appKey: 'TuPQ3Y38BG6lBdwDvl2cmMmb',placeholder: 'Just go go',avatar: '',meta: undefined,pageSize: 10,lang: 'zh-CN',recordIP: false})

Geomagicdesignx简介.html.title: Geomagicdesignx简介
Geomagicdesignx简介.html.body: 界面介绍基础设置导出为stl格式建模思路1.构建建模思路2.划分领域自动划分领域手动划分领域界面介绍 基础设置 正视于：ctrl+shift+A 导出为stl格式 无法直接导出 建模思路 1.构建建模思路 STL模型导入，六面体坐标系建立； 主体：合理地将曲面划分，利用面片创建自由曲面，将所有曲面创建完成后合并为实体； 特征结构：倒圆角； 数据导出。 领域的划分非常重要，决定曲面的平滑程度以及与实体之间的偏差 2.划分领域 自动划分领域 自动分割有时可能划分的区域不是很准确 工作中不常用 手动划分领域 按住alt左右拖动可以调节画笔大小，按住鼠标左键拖动即可，正常情况需要一次性拖动，不然前面的选择会消失，按住shift拖动叠加选择，按住ctrl撤销选择。 点击插入 面片拟合 © by winnerzr all right reserved，powered by Gitbook该文档修订时间： 2022-01-19 18:30:11 new Valine({el: "#vcomments",appId: 'Pmai2zSyIldhmWIcUD2yFIcp-gzGzoHsz',appKey: 'TuPQ3Y38BG6lBdwDvl2cmMmb',placeholder: 'Just go go',avatar: '',meta: undefined,pageSize: 10,lang: 'zh-CN',recordIP: false})
